subject: AI
title: AI-Assisted Coding
description: Use AI code assistants to write, debug, and refactor code faster.

hook.text: A developer types a comment describing a function. The AI writes the entire implementation in 2 seconds.

buildup.text: AI coding assistants like Copilot, Cursor, and Cody sit in your editor, predicting and generating code as you type.

discovery.text: The trick is context: good comments, clear variable names, and open related files give the AI much better suggestions.

twist.text: AI-generated code isn't always correct. It can introduce subtle bugs, use deprecated APIs, or hallucinate nonexistent libraries.

climax.text: Used well, AI assistants 2-3x your coding speed on boilerplate, tests, and well-defined patterns.

punchline.text: AI is the copilot. You're still the pilot.

quiz.question: What helps AI coding assistants give better suggestions?
options: Writing code in a single large file
